mapper.insert: insert into member (card_number, member_rank, member_name, member_phone, member_password, status, money)values(#{cardNumber}, #{memberRank}, #{memberName}, #{memberPhone}, #{memberPassword}, #{status}, #{money})
mapper.update: update member set member_rank=#{memberRank}, member_name=#{memberName}, member_phone=#{memberPhone}, money=#{money}, status=#{status} where card_number=#{cardNumber}
update member set money=money + #{money} where card_number = #{cardNumber}
update member set money=money - #{money} where card_number = #{cardNumber}
update member set status=#{status} where card_number = #{cardNumber}
update member set member_password=#{newMemberPassword} where card_number=#{cardNumber}
mapper.select: select * from member where member_password=#{memberPassword} and card_number=#{cardNumber}
